UI: Content Card

FAQ Card

The FAQ Card displays frequently asked questions with expandable answers in an accordion format. Features question/answer pairs with interactive expand/collapse functionality. Uses Schema.org/FAQPage markup which enables rich FAQ snippets in Google search results.

FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

What is Quantum Computing?
Quantum computing uses quantum bits to perform computations much faster than classical computers for certain problems.
When will it be mainstream?
Experts predict quantum computers will become more widely available within the next decade.
